hotels.title: Modern Malaysian Escape in the Heart of Taiping Town with Onsite Dining, Bar & Pool
hotels.description: Nestled in the heart of historic Taiping, this hotel offers a gateway to the town's timeless charm and vibrant attractions. Just a 15-minute stroll from celebrated destinations like Taiping Night Safari, the Taiping Zoo, the tranquil Taiping Lake Gardens, and the fascinating Perak Museum, Novotel Taiping Perak is perfectly positioned for exploration. Ideal for both leisure and business travellers, the modern hotel boasts a stylish restaurant, expansive pool and fitness centre, blending comfort with convenience. From your contemporary base, discover Taiping, Malaysia’s second-largest town in Perak, renowned for its colonial heritage, lush greenery, and serene ambience.
